Zelenskiy says 31,000 Ukrainian soldiers killed since Russia invadedPresident Volodymyr Zelenskiy said on Sunday that 31,000 Ukrainian soldiers had been killed since Russia's full-scale invasiontwo years ago, giving the first official figure for more than a year. Sun, 25 Feb 2024 15:49:51 GMT XE5NEXBMMBUNPLUGINWDPI6E https://www.reuters.com/world/zelenskiy-says-31000-ukrainian-soldiers-killed-during- Russias-invasion-2024-02-25/Reuters世界
Netanyahu says it is unclear if hostage deal will emergeIsraeli Prime Minister Netanyahu on Sunday said it was not clear yet whether a hostage deal would materialize from ongoing talks, declining to discuss specifics but saying the Islamist militant group Hamas needed to "come down to a reasonable situation." Sun, 25 Feb 2024 14:36:14 GMT ZKQFH3JCIVOYXJPBKSDSPZ33II https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/netanyahu-says-it-is-unclear-if-hostage-deal-will-emerge-2024-02-25/Reuters世界中东
US, Israel, Egypt and Qatar have agreed on 'basic contours' of hostage deal, Sullivan saysThe United States, Egypt, Qatar and Israel have come to an understanding of "basic contours" of a hostage deal for a temporary ceasefire in Gaza, U.S. National Security Advisor Jake Sullivan said on CNN on Sunday. Sun, 25 Feb 2024 14:35:58 GMT KTSK7QG52ZKV7EZTVJUMBAXAWM https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/us-israel-egypt-qatar-have-agreed-basic-contours-hostage-deal-sullivan-2024-02-25/Reuters世界中东
Biden not yet briefed on Israel's Rafah operation, White House's Sullivan saysU.S. President Joe Biden has not been briefed on Israel's plan for military operations in Rafah, but believes civilian life must be protected, White House national security adviser Jake Sullivan said on Sunday in an interview on NBC's "Meet the Press" program. Sun, 25 Feb 2024 14:34:16 GMT 3FT6PNYTJZJUZLRBRPZYR2CESE https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/biden-not-yet-briefed-israels-rafah-operation-white-houses-sullivan-says-2024-02-25/Reuters世界中东
Ukraine floats possibility of inviting Russia to peace summitUkraine and its foreign partners could invite Russia to a future peace summit to discuss an end to Moscow's two-year-old invasion on Kyiv's terms, a senior Ukrainian official said on Sunday. Sun, 25 Feb 2024 13:23:09 GMT BOSQZTRQJVJERI2DU4CL65FDFA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-floats-possibility-inviting-Russia-peace-summit-2024-02-25/Reuters世界欧洲
Ukraine expects $11.8 billion in US economic aid in 2024, prime minister saysUkraine expects to receive $11.8 billion in economic support this year from the United States, its prime minister said on Sunday. Sun, 25 Feb 2024 12:37:25 GMT MBSYEKXVYJLZBA76J4RH6RRE4Q https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-expects-118-bln-us-economic-aid-2024-prime-minister-says-2024-02-25/Reuters世界欧洲
Namibia's late president Geingob buriedNamibia's late president Hage Geingob, who died in hospital on Feb. 4, weeks after being diagnosed with cancer, was buried at the Heroes Acre on Sunday with thousands of mourners, including 25 heads of state and former presidents in attendance. Sun, 25 Feb 2024 12:06:22 GMT BHGO7SRHVBJQPEXCFAIHVH352Q https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/namibias-late-president-geingob-buried-2024-02-25/Nyasha Nyaungwa世界非洲
Pope Francis urges diplomatic solution to Ukraine war on anniversary of invasionPope Francis on Sunday called for a diplomatic solution to the war in Ukraine that would lead to a just and lasting peace, as the second anniversary of Russia's invasion was marked a day earlier. Sun, 25 Feb 2024 11:51:00 GMT G3MLSZJXMZO3HIGGE63G25E6OY https://www.reuters.com/world/pope-francis-urges-diplomatic-solution-ukraine-war-anniversary-invasion-2024-02-25/Reuters世界
Early jacaranda bloom sparks debate about climate change in MexicoEvery spring, the streets of Mexico's capital are painted purple with the flowering of thousands of jacaranda trees. Their spectacular colors not only attract the eyes of residents and tourists, but also birds, bees and butterflies that find food and shelter in them. Sun, 25 Feb 2024 11:09:13 GMT TEILOX5DKVNNVFR2YGILXBICKQ https://www.reuters.com/business/environment/early-jacaranda-bloom-sparks-debate-about-climate-change-mexico-2024-02-25/Diego Oré可持续发展气候与能源
Russia says its forces take better positions near Avdiivka and DonetskRussia said on Sunday that its forces had taken more advantageous positions near Avdiivka and Donetsk after President Vladimir Putin ordered the military to push further into Ukraine after two years of full-scale war. Sun, 25 Feb 2024 10:55:03 GMT 7UY5OGEP3ZPMRCC7JXFIXLFYF4 https://www.reuters.com/world/ Russia-says-its-forces-take-better-positions-near-avdiivka-donetsk-2024-02-25/Reuters世界
Israel, Hamas skirmish in Gaza as truce efforts pick up paceIsraeli troops and Palestinian gunmen clashed throughout the Gaza Strip over the weekend, as mediators picked up the pace of talks on a possible ceasefire to free hostages held by Hamas and bring a measure of Ramadan respite to the battered enclave. Sun, 25 Feb 2024 10:16:50 GMT FIWHAY7NVFJNRMNRC2QLNH2EQU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israel-hamas-skirmish-throughout-gaza-talk-truce-resurfaces-2024-02-25/Dan Williams, Nidal Al-Mughrabi世界中东
